Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/src/ConnectionPainter.cpp

1#include "ConnectionPainter.hpp"
2
3#include "Connection.hpp"
4#include "ConnectionGeometry.hpp"
5#include "ConnectionGraphicsObject.hpp"
6#include "ConnectionState.hpp"
7#include "NodeData.hpp"
8#include "StyleCollection.hpp"
9
10#include <QtGui/QIcon>
11using QtNodes::Connection;
12using QtNodes::ConnectionGeometry;
13using QtNodes::ConnectionPainter;
14static QPainterPath cubicPath(ConnectionGeometry const &geom)
15{
16 QPointF const &source = geom.source();
17 QPointF const &sink = geom.sink();
18 auto c1c2 = geom.pointsC1C2();
19 // cubic spline
20 QPainterPath cubic(source);
21 cubic.cubicTo(c1c2.first, c1c2.second, sink);
22 return cubic;
23}
24QPainterPath ConnectionPainter::getPainterStroke(ConnectionGeometry const &geom)
25{
26 auto cubic = cubicPath(geom);
27 QPointF const &source = geom.source();
28 QPainterPath result(source);
29 unsigned segments = 20;
30 for (auto i = 0ul; i < segments; ++i)
31 {
32 double ratio = double(i + 1) / segments;
33 result.lineTo(cubic.pointAtPercent(ratio));
34 }
35 QPainterPathStroker stroker;
36 stroker.setWidth(10.0);
37 return stroker.createStroke(result);
38}
39#ifdef NODE_DEBUG_DRAWING
40static void debugDrawing(QPainter *painter, Connection const &connection)
41{
42 Q_UNUSED(painter);
43 Q_UNUSED(connection);
44 ConnectionGeometry const &geom = connection.connectionGeometry();
45 {
46 QPointF const &source = geom.source();
47 QPointF const &sink = geom.sink();
48 auto points = geom.pointsC1C2();
49 painter->setPen(Qt::red);
50 painter->setBrush(Qt::red);
51 painter->drawLine(QLineF(source, points.first));
52 painter->drawLine(QLineF(points.first, points.second));
53 painter->drawLine(QLineF(points.second, sink));
54 painter->drawEllipse(points.first, 3, 3);
55 painter->drawEllipse(points.second, 3, 3);
56 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
57 painter->drawPath(cubicPath(geom));
58 }
59 {
60 painter->setPen(Qt::yellow);
61 painter->drawRect(geom.boundingRect());
62 }
63}
64#endif
65static void drawSketchLine(QPainter *painter, Connection const &connection)
66{
67 using QtNodes::ConnectionState;
68 ConnectionState const &state = connection.connectionState();
69 if (state.requiresPort())
70 {
71 auto const &connectionStyle = QtNodes::StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
72 QPen p;
73 p.setWidth(connectionStyle.constructionLineWidth());
74 p.setColor(connectionStyle.constructionColor());
75 p.setStyle(Qt::DashLine);
76 painter->setPen(p);
77 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
78 using QtNodes::ConnectionGeometry;
79 ConnectionGeometry const &geom = connection.connectionGeometry();
80 auto cubic = cubicPath(geom);
81 // cubic spline
82 painter->drawPath(cubic);
83 }
84}
85static void drawHoveredOrSelected(QPainter *painter, Connection const &connection)
86{
87 using QtNodes::ConnectionGeometry;
88 ConnectionGeometry const &geom = connection.connectionGeometry();
89 bool const hovered = geom.hovered();
90 auto const &graphicsObject = connection.getConnectionGraphicsObject();
91 bool const selected = graphicsObject.isSelected();
92 // drawn as a fat background
93 if (hovered || selected)
94 {
95 QPen p;
96 auto const &connectionStyle = QtNodes::StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
97 double const lineWidth = connectionStyle.lineWidth();
98 p.setWidth(2 * lineWidth);
99 p.setColor(selected ? connectionStyle.selectedHaloColor() : connectionStyle.hoveredColor());
100 painter->setPen(p);
101 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
102 // cubic spline
103 auto cubic = cubicPath(geom);
104 painter->drawPath(cubic);
105 }
106}
107static void drawNormalLine(QPainter *painter, Connection const &connection)
108{
109 using QtNodes::ConnectionState;
110 ConnectionState const &state = connection.connectionState();
111 if (state.requiresPort())
112 return;
113 // colors
114 auto const &connectionStyle = QtNodes::StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
115 QColor normalColorOut = connectionStyle.normalColor();
116 QColor normalColorIn = connectionStyle.normalColor();
117 QColor selectedColor = connectionStyle.selectedColor();
118 bool gradientColor = false;
119 if (connectionStyle.useDataDefinedColors())
120 {
121 using QtNodes::PortType;
122 auto dataTypeOut = connection.dataType(PortType::Out);
123 auto dataTypeIn = connection.dataType(PortType::In);
124 gradientColor = (*dataTypeOut != *dataTypeIn);
125 normalColorOut = connectionStyle.normalColor(dataTypeOut->id());
126 normalColorIn = connectionStyle.normalColor(dataTypeIn->id());
127 selectedColor = normalColorOut.darker(200);
128 }
129 // geometry
130 ConnectionGeometry const &geom = connection.connectionGeometry();
131 double const lineWidth = connectionStyle.lineWidth();
132 // draw normal line
133 QPen p;
134 p.setWidth(lineWidth);
135 auto const &graphicsObject = connection.getConnectionGraphicsObject();
136 bool const selected = graphicsObject.isSelected();
137 auto cubic = cubicPath(geom);
138 if (gradientColor)
139 {
140 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
141 QColor c = normalColorOut;
142 if (selected)
143 c = c.darker(200);
144 p.setColor(c);
145 painter->setPen(p);
146 unsigned int const segments = 60;
147 for (unsigned int i = 0ul; i < segments; ++i)
148 {
149 double ratioPrev = double(i) / segments;
150 double ratio = double(i + 1) / segments;
151 if (i == segments / 2)
152 {
153 QColor c = normalColorIn;
154 if (selected)
155 c = c.darker(200);
156 p.setColor(c);
157 painter->setPen(p);
158 }
159 painter->drawLine(cubic.pointAtPercent(ratioPrev), cubic.pointAtPercent(ratio));
160 }
161 {
162 QIcon icon(":convert.png");
163 QPixmap pixmap = icon.pixmap(QSize(22, 22));
164 painter->drawPixmap(cubic.pointAtPercent(0.50) - QPoint(pixmap.width() / 2, pixmap.height() / 2), pixmap);
165 }
166 }
167 else
168 {
169 p.setColor(normalColorOut);
170 if (selected)
171 {
172 p.setColor(selectedColor);
173 }
174 painter->setPen(p);
175 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
176 painter->drawPath(cubic);
177 }
178}
179void ConnectionPainter::paint(QPainter *painter, Connection const &connection)
180{
181 drawHoveredOrSelected(painter, connection);
182 drawSketchLine(painter, connection);
183 drawNormalLine(painter, connection);
184#ifdef NODE_DEBUG_DRAWING
185 debugDrawing(painter, connection);
186#endif
187 // draw end points
188 ConnectionGeometry const &geom = connection.connectionGeometry();
189 QPointF const &source = geom.source();
190 QPointF const &sink = geom.sink();
191 auto const &connectionStyle = QtNodes::StyleCollection::connectionStyle();
192 double const pointDiameter = connectionStyle.pointDiameter();
193 painter->setPen(connectionStyle.constructionColor());
194 painter->setBrush(connectionStyle.constructionColor());
195 double const pointRadius = pointDiameter / 2.0;
196 painter->drawEllipse(source, pointRadius, pointRadius);
197 painter->drawEllipse(sink, pointRadius, pointRadius);
198}
